text: Thisai Maariya Paravaigal () is a 1979 Tamil-language romance film, directed and written by S. Jagadeesan. The film was produced by P. S. Veerappa and P. S. V. Hari Haran under his productions P. S. V. Pictures. The film screenplay were written by P. L. Sundararajan. Music by M. S. Viswanathan was an asset to the film. It Stars Sarath Babu and Sumalatha. This was Sumalatha's debut film appearance. == Plot == A harijan girl is brought up by a high-cast Brahmin in the agraharam, and the family is faced with antagonism and hatred. The girl's marriage to a Brahmin boy is thwarted, and out of frustration, she joins a nunnery. == Cast == * Sarath Babu * Sumalatha * Major Sundararajan * V. S. Raghavan * M. N. Rajam * T. V.
